definition: "silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
clown/2nd earthly branch: 1-3 a.m., 12th solar month (6th January to 3rd February), year of the Ox/ancient Chinese compass point: 30°
Nürnberg or Nuremberg, town in Bavaria, Germany

pinyin: Niu3 yue1 Zheng4 quan4 Jiao1 yi4 suo3

definition: Inuit (politically correct term for Eskimo 愛斯基摩人|爱斯基摩人)

sentences.english: The Nurburgring demands that kind of versatility .
sentences.chinese: 紐博格林需要這種全能性賽車。

sentences.english: On Sunday morning we had singing lessons with Vishnu.
sentences.chinese: 星期天的早晨，我們上毗溼紐的歌唱課。

sentences.english: He himself showed up at the cells in Newgate to take depositions from the men he caught.
sentences.chinese: 他自己發現這些細胞在紐蓋特到從他被捕的男子供詞。

sentences.english: New Orleans is the home of French cuisine in America.
sentences.chinese: 在美國，紐奧爾良是法國菜的發源地。

sentences.english: On Saturday, three people died in the German town of Neukirchen, near the Czech border.
sentences.chinese: 週六德國靠近捷克邊境城市紐克爾遜三人已經死亡。

sentences.english: Tottenham striker Jermain Defoe, and maybe Nugent, will be a good option to come off the bench if needed.
sentences.chinese: 熱刺前鋒迪福以及紐根特都將會是有實力的替補。

sentences.english: in Nucla they crowd the counter and talk loudly about health problems.
sentences.chinese: 在紐克拉他們圍着櫃檯高聲談論健康問題。

sentences.english: Thy coral clasps and amber studs.
sentences.chinese: 珊瑚的扣子和琥珀紐的晶彩。

sentences.english: eventually, they settled in Nucla and opened the Apothecary Shoppe.
sentences.chinese: 後來，他們在紐克拉定居並開了“藥劑師專櫃”。

sentences.english: The Inuits in Greenland are the World's northernmost settled population.
sentences.chinese: 格陵蘭的紐因特人是世界上最北方的居民。

sentences.english: Whether he will also be able to claim to know those of the good burghers of celebrity-studded Neuilly is another matter.
sentences.chinese: 然而，馬提龍能否拉攏紐利市的知名人士還是一個謎。

sentences.english: The relationship between Nixon and Agnew illustrated these maxims .
sentences.chinese: 尼克松和阿格紐之間的關係就是這些準則的證明。

sentences.english: Then he went out for eight successive days with his rosette.
sentences.chinese: 接着，他天天帶上那小玫瑰紐上街，一連跑了八天。

sentences.english: The relationship between Nixon and Agnew illustrated these maxims.
sentences.chinese: 尼克松和阿格紐之間的關係就是這些準則的證明。

sentences.english: Are you going to race your horse at Newmarket next week ?
sentences.chinese: 你要讓你的馬參加下週在紐馬克特的賽馬會嗎？

sentences.english: Emily Cheng was born in New York City and grew up in New Jersey.
sentences.chinese: 成瑞嫺出生於紐約市，成長於紐澤西州。

definition: only used in 濟濟|济济[ji3 ji3]
to cross a river/to aid or relieve/to be of help
used in place names associated with the Ji River 濟水|济水[Ji3 Shui3]/surname Ji
(used for transliteration)/old variant of 謳|讴[ou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐洲|欧洲[Ou1 zhou1]/surname Ou
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
United Kingdom 聯合王國|联合王国[Lian2 he2 wang2 guo2]/United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland/abbr. for England 英格蘭|英格兰[Ying1 ge2 lan2]
Europe/abbr. for 歐羅巴洲|欧罗巴洲[Ou1 luo2 ba1 Zhou1]
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing
(bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
